alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:49AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Muscogee and southwestern Harris Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 649 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Green Island Hills, or near Smiths, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Bibb City, Goat Rock Lake, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Flat Rock, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Sand Hill, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Kenwood, Midland, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park and Fortson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
